article_text: It's amazing what clients can walk in with: overflowing shoeboxes, demands for a refund in cash, insistence that you do their return before all others. Taxpayers try to deduct everything from unborn children and kids' weddings to speeding fines, groceries and massages. Many also walk around with some pretty wacky ideas about filing and taxpaying.

article_metadata.description: Tax preparers share their clients strangest misconceptions
article_metadata.title: Taxpayers Are the Craziest People

article_summary:
Taxpayers try to deduct everything from unborn children and kids' weddings to speeding fines, groceries and massages.
Many also walk around with some pretty wacky ideas about filing and taxpaying.
It's amazing what clients can walk in with: overflowing shoeboxes, demands for a refund in cash, insistence that you do their return before all others.
